sentences.en: Emergency services seem impotent in the face of such a disaster.
sentences.cn: 面对这种灾难，应急服务机构似乎无能为力。

sentences.en: He feels despondent and impotent . He intends to quit.
sentences.cn: 一股沮丧情绪袭来, 甚至有了退出的打算.
他哆嗦着, 丧失了勇气,浑身无力.

sentences.en: In the dreams of the impotent, comes the answer.
sentences.cn: 它回答道:“在那无能为力者的梦境里. ”

sentences.en: Only then will the Fed really start to feel impotent.
sentences.cn: 也许到那时,联邦储备委员会才会真正感到回天乏术.

sentences.en: Pearl was so obviously suffering , consumed with impotent rage.
sentences.cn: 显然波儿很难过, 给发不出来的愤怒啮蚀着.

sentences.en: Scarlett kicked the coverlet in impotent rage, trying to think of something bad enough to say.
sentences.cn: 思嘉气得一脚踢开被子, 想找一句最难听的话来咒骂一声.

sentences.en: The aggression of a bully leaves people feeling hurt, angry and impotent.
sentences.cn: 暴徒的侵犯令人们感到痛心、愤怒却又无能为力。

sentences.en: The old man was grim but impotent in his rage.
sentences.cn: 老头儿很严肃,但是愤怒而无能为力.

sentences.en: The sincere if impotent desire wins his blessing.
sentences.cn: 即使愿望是微弱的,但只要真诚,就能得到他的祝福.

sentences.en: The use of Ozawa's impotent carriers as a decoy force was brilliant.
sentences.cn: 利用小泽那几条脆弱的航空母舰作为一支诱敌舰队,这个战略也是十分巧妙的.

sentences.en: They were virtually impotent against the power of the large companies.
sentences.cn: 他们实际上无力与实力雄厚的大公司抗衡.

sentences.en: This clown's impotent, suicidal and incredibly stupid.
sentences.cn: 这个小丑性无能有自杀倾向,愚蠢!

sentences.en: We should rid our ranks of all impotent thinking.
sentences.cn: 我们要肃清我们队伍中的一切消极思想.

sentences.en: We should rid out ranks of all impotent thinking.
sentences.cn: 我们应当摆脱我们的等级观念.

words.tran_cn: 虚弱地；无能为力地；阳痿地
[泌尿][中医] 阳萎；虚弱；无效（等于impotency）
无力；无效；无法可想；性无能
无力的；无效的；虚弱的；[泌尿]阳萎的

trans.tran_cn: 无力的，虚弱的，无效的，[医]阳痿的
trans.tran_en: unable to take effective action because you do not have enough power, strength, or control
